name: Stay Upstream
slogan: Upstream helps make sales teams smarter, providing the latest data and insight
description:
Upstream provides data and insights to allow sales teams to be more effective and efficient. We deliver the most accurate contact information for marketing and digital decision makers, combined with the latest company triggers so any sales approach is timely and relevant.  

Our team has been both managing and supporting sales people for last 15 years and know exactly what is required. Upstream is like having your own personal research team ensuring you have the latest and most accurate data to help you accelerate your sales campaigns.  

Upfront Business Development has worked with close to 500 agencies across marketing, communications, digital and SaaS. Over the last 12 years we have made millions of calls, run thousands of email campaigns and managed hundreds of programmes – helping our clients generate well over £100 million in new business wins

team.name: Jody Osman
team.bioHtml: Founder @Upfront Business Development, @Stay Upstream

team.name: Guy Edwards
team.bioHtml: I = Marketing. Advertising. Tech, Single Malts. Fine English Gun Makers. Fly Fishing. An Outdoorsman & Bon viveur.

jobs.title: Senior Business Development Manager
jobs.description:
Great opportunity for a self sufficient and ambitious sales manager to take on an exciting role in helping a leading US SaaS sales intelligence tool establish itself in the UK.

You will have the chance to drive all sales efforts in the UK, supported by an International marketing team, event / sponsorship and partners - with the view of over time, building and establishing your own team.

Will suit someone looking for extra responsibility and the chance to drive development in a new market.
